data.text: @SenatorRisch @SenatorRisch 90000+ killed in 46 days. IRGC's shadow fleet fuels the massacre. Freeze their assets now. #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026 #KingRezaPahlavi
@OldStateSaloon @SenatorRisch Idaho only getting 1%.  Wonder how much the politicians are getting?
@OldStateSaloon @SenatorRisch Let's ask the Canadian companies that own most of grimes pass
@OldStateSaloon @SenatorRisch Only Idaho owned companies should be able to mine in the state of Idaho.

@OldStateSaloon @SenatorRisch The post questions Idaho's 1% mining royalty rate—set by state law since 1935—versus higher rates like Alaska's 3% on mineral net income, suggesting corporate influence in undervaluing local resources. Looks like someone needs to have a look at outdated laws!
@OldStateSaloon @SenatorRisch Getting only 1% of the royalties but 100% of the pollution.
@OldStateSaloon @SenatorRisch I've wondered that too. How is AK & WY able to leverage their natural resources to create 2 of the lowest taxed states in the USA? Why can't we do that too?
@OldStateSaloon @SenatorRisch Sold off for pennies by merger bribes
